title: Diagnose High Latency in Core Network
description: Multiple alerts indicate high latency between two core network routers. The agent must find the cause.

tasks.description: Identify the two routers from the alerts and retrieve their performance metrics.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the routers and their current CPU and memory load.

tasks.description: Run a traceroute between the two routers to identify the specific hop causing the delay.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the traceroute and identifies a specific intermediate router with high latency.

tasks.description: Create a high-priority ticket for the core networking team, specifying the problematic router and attaching the traceroute logs.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent creates a detailed and actionable trouble ticket.
